name: ACTION GAME
description:
I wanted a quick action game that i could play whenever. Made in 5 days

Has like 6 or 7 different weapons and about 7 different enemies.

Controls

W,A,S,D - to move

Left mouse - Fires Weapon

Right Mouse - Fires grabber chain (Hold Right Mouse to reel it in)

If you are hit you will lose your weapon. If you are hit without your weapon you will be closer to failure. 3 Weaponless hits and you will lose.

The grabber chain will grab enemies and weapons, if they reach the white circle any grabbed thing will be dropped.

Move to a weapon to pick it up if you are not holding it.\

Have fun lads! <3
